fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action
head_office_address: Unit 19, Omega Business Village Thurston Road
eu_initiatives: Any matters affecting the manufacture, supply and sale of construction equipment. This includes the Machinery Directive, Emissions (Noise and gas and particulate), Outdoor Noise Directive, external trade relations.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Representative trade association for the construction equipment sector in the United Kingdom. A member of the Committee for European Construction Equipment and recognised by the UK Government.
